items.summary: Update the existing trainer/coaches section (currently implemented in `frontend/src/components/sections/TrainerHighlights.tsx` and rendered on the homepage) to be a multi-coach “Meet Our Expert Coaches” section that displays the user-provided initial 3 coach profiles: (1) Lavesh Kodwani — “Strength, Conditioning, Weight Loss & Nutrition Expert” — “8+ years”; (2) Hemraj Dhakar — “Strength, Weight Loss” — “3+ Years”; (3) Ishika Sahu — “Zumba & Dance Fitness” (no experience provided).

Make the coaches list easy to maintain by centralizing the coaches data in a single, obvious frontend location (for example a config export similar to `MARKETING_CONFIG`) and update the coaches section to consume that data.

Prepare the Google Maps location update by ensuring the embedded map uses `MARKETING_CONFIG.googleMapsEmbedUrl` (already referenced by `frontend/src/components/sections/MapEmbed.tsx`) and document (in code comments) exactly where to paste the new Google Maps embed URL once the user provides it; do not change the current embed URL value until the user supplies the new location URL/address.

When the new Google Maps location details are provided later (either a full Google Maps embed URL or an address), update location-dependent user-facing text and structured data to stay consistent across the site (map embed, contact page SEO text, and JSON-LD geo/address where applicable), using English text.
